description: determine the author from provided text (agipy)
prompt_template:
lambda x: f"""{metaprocess_headers["agipy"]}>>> print("foo")
foo
>>> import numpy as np
>>> np.array([0, 0, 0])
array([0, 0, 0])
>>> from AGIpy import attribute_source
>>> print(attribute_source("To be, or not to be, that is the question")
<AGIpy.attribute_source.AttributeSource object at 0x7f8f9c0c5f60>
>>> print(attribute_source("To be, or not to be, that is the question").author)
William Shakespeare
>>> print(attribute_source("This partly fixed and partly fluid content of language engenders a special relationship between it and the speaking generation. There is generated within it a stock of words and a system of rules whereby it grows, in the course of millennia, into an independent force.").author)
Wilhelm Von Humboldt
>>> print(attribute_source("If you cannot saw with a file or file with a saw, then you will be no good as an experimentalist.").author)
Augustin Fresnel
>>> print(attribute_source("{x}").author)"""
